00029                 typedef HResult (*INTERFACE_LOCATOR_FUNC)(void *pThis, void* pChain, SF_RIID riid, void **ppv);
00030 
00032                 static const INTERFACE_LOCATOR_FUNC SF_OFFSET_ENTRY = (INTERFACE_LOCATOR_FUNC)1;

00041                 {

00052                 struct _CHAINDATA
00053                 {
00054                         size_t dwOffset;
00055                         const INTERFACE_MAP_ENTRY* (*pFunc)();

00062                 template <class base, class derived>
00063                 class _ComChainData     { public: static _CHAINDATA data; };
00064 
00065                 template <class base, class derived>
00066                 _CHAINDATA _ComChainData<base, derived>::data = {classoffset<base, derived>(), base::_GetEntries};

00074         #define BEGIN_INTERFACE_MAP() public:                                                                                                                                                                           \
00075         module::IUnknown* GetUnknown() throw() {return (module::IUnknown*)((size_t)this+(size_t)_GetEntries()->OffChain); }                     \
00076         const static module::detail::INTERFACE_MAP_ENTRY* _GetEntries() throw() {                                                                                                       \
00077         static const module::detail::INTERFACE_MAP_ENTRY _entries[] = {
00078 
00080         
00081         #define INTERFACE_ENTRY(intrfc) \
00082         {&uuid_of(intrfc), (void*)classoffset<intrfc, _ThisClass>(), module::detail::SF_OFFSET_ENTRY},
00083 
00085 
00086         #define INTERFACE_ENTRY_BRANCHED(intrfc, branch) \
00087         {&uuid_of(intrfc), static_cast<void*>(static_cast<intrfc*>(static_cast<branch*>(reinterpret_cast<_ThisClass*>(8))))-8, module::detail::SF_OFFSET_ENTRY},
00088 
00090 
00091         #define INTERFACE_ENTRY_CHAIN(baseclass)\
00092         {0, (void*)&module::detail::_ComChainData<baseclass, _ThisClass>::data, module::detail::_Chain},
00093 
00095 
00096         #define END_INTERFACE_MAP()                                                                                                     \
00097         {0, 0, 0}}; return &_entries[0];}                                                                                       \
00098         unsigned long AddRef() { return 1; }                                                                            \
00099         unsigned long Release() { return 1; }                                                                           \
00100         module::HResult QueryInterface(SF_RIID iid, void **ppObject)                            \
00101         { return module::detail::_QueryInterface(this, _GetEntries(), iid, ppObject); }

00110         DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATIONA(className, module::new_allocator)
00111 
00113 
00114         #define DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATIONA(className, Allocator)                                                                                                                   \
00115         DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION2A(className, Allocator, module::ComClassFactory)
00116 
00118 
00119         #define DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION2(className, factoryClass)                                                                                                                \
00120         DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION2A(className, module::new_allocator, factoryClass)
00121 
00123 
00124         #define DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION2A(className, Allocator, factoryClass)                                                                                    \
00125         public:                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00126         typedef className _ThisClass;                                                                                                                                                                   \
00127         typedef module::detail::ComObject<className, Allocator> _ObjectClass;                                                                                   \
00128         typedef factoryClass< _ObjectClass > _FactoryClass;
00129 
00131 
00132         #define DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION_DERIVED(className, baseClassName)                                                                                                \
00133         DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION_DERIVED2(className, baseClassName, module::ComClassFactory)
00134 
00136 
00137         #define DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION_DERIVED2(className, baseClassName, factoryClass)                                                                 \
00138         public:                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00139         typedef baseClassName _BaseClass;                                                                                                                                                               \
00140         typedef className _ThisClass;                                                                                                                                                                   \
00141         typedef module::detail::ComObject<className> _ObjectClass;                                                                                                              \
00142         typedef factoryClass< _ObjectClass > _FactoryClass;

00153 
00154                 typedef HResult (CREATOR_FUNC)(SF_RIID riid, void** ppv);
00155 
00156                 typedef reflection::user_type* (TYPE_OF_FUNC)();
00157 
00159                 struct MODULE_MAP_ENTRY
00160                 {
00161                         const guid*                     pClsid;
00162                         const guid*                     pInterfaceId;
00163                         TYPE_OF_FUNC*           pTypeOf;
00164                         CREATOR_FUNC*           pCreateFactoryFn;
00165                         IClassFactory*          pClassFactory;
00166                 };

00173         #define DECLARE_MODULE_MAP()                                                                                                                                                                    \
00174         extern "C" SHARED_EXPORT module::detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* GetModuleMap();
00175 
00177 
00178         #define BEGIN_MODULE_MAP()                                                                                                                                                                              \
00179         extern "C" SHARED_EXPORT module::detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* GetModuleMap()                                                                               \
00180         { static module::detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY e[] = {
00181 
00183 
00184         #define OBJECT_ENTRY(clssid, intrfID, clss)                                                                                                                                             \
00185         { &clssid, &intrfID, 0, module::detail::ComObject<clss::_FactoryClass>::_CreateInstance, 0 },
00186 
00188 
00189         #define OBJECT_ENTRY_REFLECTED(clssid, intrfID, clss, type_func)                                                                                                \
00190         { &clssid, &intrfID, type_func, module::detail::ComObject<clss::_FactoryClass>::_CreateInstance, 0 },
00191 
00193 
00194         #define END_MODULE_MAP()                                                                                                                                                                                \
00195         { 0, 0, 0, 0 } };                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00196         return e; }                                                                                                                                                                                                             \
00197                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00198         extern "C" SHARED_EXPORT void ModuleInit() { }                                                                                                                                  \
00199         extern "C" SHARED_EXPORT void ModuleShutdown()                                                                                                                                  \
00200         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00201                 module::detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* e = GetModuleMap();                                                                                                           \
00202                 while(e->pClsid)                                                                                                                                                                                        \
00203                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00204                         if(e->pClassFactory)                                                                                                                                                                    \
00205                         {                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00206                                 e->pClassFactory->Release();                                                                                                                                            \
00207                                 e->pClassFactory = 0;                                                                                                                                                           \
00208                         }                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00209                         ++e;                                                                                                                                                                                                    \
00210                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00211         }
